data.text:
BEAUTIFUL LANDSCAPES START HERE

LANDSCAPE CONSTRUCTION | COMMERCIAL MAINTENANCE | GARDEN CENTER

Our three pillars

Landscape Construction | Commercial Maintenance | Garden Center

We pride ourselves on Our Three Pillars that form the foundation of our exceptional service. Our Landscape Construction Team brings visions to life, crafting beautiful, functional outdoor spaces for both residential and commercial clients. Our Commercial Landscape Maintenance Team ensures that businesses and HOAs enjoy pristine, well-maintained landscapes year-round. Lastly, our Garden Center offers a premier destination for plant enthusiasts, providing a diverse selection of quality plants, expert advice, and a warm inviting atmosphere. Together, these pillars uphold our commitment to excellence and community growth.

Explore our landscape construction services and enjoy a seamless experience from consultation to completion. Our dedicated landscape designer will be your project manager, guiding you through every step. From capturing your vision to the final installation, our designer ensures every detail meets your expectations. We transform both commercial and residential outdoor spaces into stunning, functional environments that reflect your unique style and needs.

Explore our commercial landscaping services and discover tailored solutions designed to enhance your business’s outdoor spaces. Our skilled teams use innovative methods to ensure your landscape is both beautiful and functional, creating a lasting impression for your clients and visitors. From regular maintenance to comprehensive improvements, we provide the expertise and dedication needed to keep your commercial property looking its best year-round.

Explore our destination garden center and discover vibrant greenery, expert advice, and unique decor. Our knowledgeable horticulturists are on staff to recommend plants tailored to your specific needs, ensuring your garden thrives. Our friendly team is ready to assist you with loading purchases into your vehicle, and for an additional fee, we even offer planting services to bring your vision to life effortlessly.

Trusted in the Treasure Valley for 50+ years

In the summer 1971, Franz Witte (yes, the man himself) started a Boise landscaping company. No nursery, no maintenance department, just a young man and his aspirations to build and install awesome landscapes. What started as a summer job turned into one of Idaho’s most successful landscape, maintenance, and garden center companies.

What Our Customers Are Saying

Staci Woodland

19:40 20 Jun 24

I was surprised by the lack of help within this garden center. I have been at many others where the employees check on you, offer their assistance, and share expertise and advise on plant selection. This nursery was lacking in these areas. I purchased some roses and discovered after planting that they came from the nursery with Black Spot fungus.

Paul Egert

21:47 18 Jun 24

Wonderful experience working with Emily on our landscape design and selection of trees and bushes. Dillion and team did a excellent job on the install. I really appreciated that Emily also came out to help with the placement of the product and helped with install. I'd highly recommend Franz Witte for your gardening needs.

Andy Flores

00:42 13 May 24

Great greenhouse. Used to be in Boise, but is a fantastic addition to Nampa. It’s huge and lots of options.

Adrienne “GreatAdi” Chaplin

01:23 28 Apr 24

They seemed to have anything you'd want. Whether you're a beginner or a master gardener. The staff was really helpful to this beginner.

Madison Matteo

22:36 22 Apr 24

Update the jokes !! Best part of everyone’s drive when they go past.

Rebecca Sullivan

20:26 10 Apr 24

Nice job planting my five new shrubs! Excellent job by professional landscapers. The plants look very healthy. Dylan and Jess were wonderful. Thanks!

ronald conley

21:20 25 Mar 24

Beautiful with lots of stunning plants, and amazing nicknaks. A little on the high end in the price, but we still bought items!! Worth the time to stop and just wonder around.

Peggy Roth

02:21 03 Dec 23

Went to Franz Witte for the first time today and Loved my experience. Desi and Natalia were the best at helping me with my purchases. The best customer service I've had in a long time. I'm new to the area and always look for a garden center and I found it.

Randy Miller

17:35 26 Nov 23

Love coming here.

Julie Combs

21:09 29 Sep 23

Carrie Hawkins

04:06 17 Sep 23

Grateful to Nate at Franz Witte for the expertise and education he provided us while tree shopping. Super helpful!

Chris Killian

22:05 12 Sep 23

I always find something at your beautiful store. I picked up a Pumpkin Dulce Candle and some small Ceramic Mushrooms for my house plants and a Bee bath basket with succulents. I can’t have my pollinators drowning. I was excited to have the praying mantis saying goodbye on my way out:)

Luanna Rozentals

01:12 04 Sep 23

Lovely shopping experience. Good quality plants. A little pricy though.

Teena Lewis

19:57 14 Aug 23

Great staff and wonderful plants

Lisa Storrs

19:19 07 Aug 23

We recently purchased a new build home. Need less to say we were given the basics in our front and backyard. Patrick came out and worked up a design to get some life and curb appeal into our home! The crew came out and were very professional and courteous! Seeing my front and back yard come to life has been amazing! From the growth of the trees and plants to the lighting at night... Thank you Patrick and crew for may more years of enjoyment!! -Jason and Lisa

Carol Lofsvold

21:46 07 Jul 23

Everything possible to tease your garden senses.

Skeeter Meyers

22:59 28 Jun 23

Wonderful nursery and gift shop! Knowledgeable about plants and friendly staff!

Benjamin Munoz

19:44 27 Jun 23

Finally had a chance to stop by and check everything out! Lots of options and great stuff!!

Ben Hunter

19:52 27 May 23

The staff at Franz Witte are so kind and helpful! My wife and I bought a magnolia tree and planned to pick it up the next day. I forgot my receipt when I came to get it and the were more than happy to look up my order to verify it. With my broken thumb I wasn’t able to load the tree in my trailer by myself, so a gentleman helped me get it out to my car and get it all loaded up. Thanks Franz Witte!

Jack Jensen

15:38 03 May 23

Dylan Mick came and installed some beautiful trees at my new home. He was on time, kind, helpful, and extremely professional and thorough. He took the time to understand what I wanted done and made sure that my expectations were met with exactness. I can’t give him and his crew high enough praise. If this was on a scale on 1-10, I would give him a 20. Franz Witte has a superstar employee in Dylan and we truly appreciate the experience he gave us.

Pattie Waters

20:01 30 Apr 23

Prices a little steep but best selection of yard pottery and decor in the valley.

Nolan Boyle

03:26 18 Feb 23

I went to Far West and picked out a tree. They loaded the tree while I went in to pay. The ladies at the counter were so rude while I tried to use a voucher from Idaho Power that I eventually walked out and had them unload the tree. I then went to Franz Witte and found a much nicer and bigger tree for a lower price! The staff was friendly and excellent with no issues using the Idaho Power voucher.

Northern Star HOA Management

20:51 09 Nov 22

The Franz Witte commercial team handles the landscaping maintenance for several subdivisions we manage. Our rep, Sydney G, has been awesome to work with. We also love working with Joe G. They are both responsive and their customer service is great! Thanks Franz Witte team for a great landscaping season - we look forward to another great year working with you to take care of the subdivisions we manage.

Tracy Krylo

21:49 10 Oct 22

UPDATE: 10/10/22 Today I spoke with Jeffery (sorry if I'm misspelling your name) and she was wonderful. She was able to honor the website flyer and I got my cute yard art. She even helped us pick out another plant for your yard. She went over and beyond and was so very gracious. We love the selection there and will be adding more plants to our yard soon.10/8/22 Today was the first day I was disappointed after visiting Franz Witte. I went with the purpose of buying a piece of yard art I had seen because their flyer and website said all non metal yard art was 40% off. When I was there I was told it didn't include the one I wanted. The flyer and website said nothing about any exclusions so I felt they should have honored the advertisement. I notice now the non metal yard art has been removed from the website and the flyers were thrown away when I was there.

Kathy Henderson

16:16 13 Aug 22

Worth the drive just for the home and garden decor and smelly good soaps, lotions and candles. And I give them 10 stars for preserving that fabulous barn and the 2 silos. ❤️

Nancy Barrick

05:01 12 Jul 22

Love this store! The selection of plants along with fun decorative items is amazing! The staff is very helpful

Bird Fleck

00:21 07 Apr 22

Staff was really nice and showed me around a bit. They do seasonal plants and they have cold weather plants right now. They do have classes which seems really cool. They didn't have many herbs and that's why I gave 4 stars. I was hoping there would be more options. Pretty gift shop and they had a lot of pots and garden decorations.

Michelle T

22:25 30 Oct 21

Love the tranquil space, fun decor, and friendly staff. I’ve bought many plants and supplies here, and always leave with a dirty chai latte w/ vanilla in my hand from the coffee truck. I have unfortunately had issues with pests in 3 of the plants I bought there, so I have to remember to inspect the plants VERY thoroughly before buying and quarantine an extra long time just to be safe. I wish they would do more to control pests, particularly for their indoor plant selection. But besides that issue, I love this place and will continue going often for everything it has to offer, even if I have to take my magnifying glass with me.

Nancy

19:34 04 Oct 21

WOW !!! I am Not from here but travel from out of state to visit my Sister in Meridian. She brought me here a couple of months ago and I just had to come back ! This is the most Amazing Nursery I have been to ! I love how they kept the Silos and other buildings when purchasing this ranch. There is such a positive energy that flows around here. The plants are very unique and gorgeous. Same with the displays. I fell in love with the Metal Iron Birds for Sale . The Gift Shop is such a pleasure to browse in !On my next visit I plan on going to their Store in McCall . Plan on taking time to browse through here!

Kim Huska

23:19 11 Sep 21

Beautiful set up. Plants & shrubs easy to find. The employees were very helpful and outgoing. Finn is very knowledgeable. Have us some awesome suggestions.

Michael Hunt

20:10 27 Jul 21

Stopped in looking for a bonsai plant for a gift. Found one which we had repotted. Turned out well. Walked around looking at the abundance of trees and plants. Very pretty setup which is expanding.

Maryalice Pfeiffer

22:17 25 May 21

I recently visited their new location.. it is absolutely gorgeous. The staff acknowledged me right away and offered any help I could want but also made me feel free to just browse and enjoy the new nursery. Well it is way more than a nursery. A lot of gift items. Just a fantastic way to spend my Saturday. Love, love , love it. Keep it up Franz Witte!

Micah Dougherty

17:15 26 Aug 20

Franz Witte installed our front and backyard for our new build. They have gone above and beyond expectations, and provide ample help learning about our new landscape. They have helped even when it wasn't they're domain. They are very knowledgeable, and great communicators!

Years and Counting

0

Enhance Your Surroundings

At Franz Witte, we believe that your landscape dreams are attainable. Our experts will guide you from start to finish while listening to your needs and desires. Whether you’re a commercial HOA looking for someone to maintain your community right or a homeowner looking to refresh your backyard, we are here for you.

Explore Our Destination Garden Center

We are centrally located at:

20005 11th Ave North

Visit us in North Nampa, today!

We are proud to offer weekly

events and workshops for

everyone to enjoy!

Let's Garden Together!

Franz Witte’s Garden Center employs horticulturists who are educated in Idaho flora and trained in customer service. So you can leave here feeling inspired and confident, instead of drained and defeated.
